DELETE /zones/{zone_id}/snippets/snippet.description: Deletes all snippet rules belonging to the zone.

schema.description: Use this field to specify the unique ID of the zone.
schema.title: Zone ID

allOf.description: Return all API responses using this object.

success.description: Indicate whether the API call was successful.
success.title: Success

allOf.title: Response

description.description: Provide an informative description of the rule.
description.example: Execute my_snippet when IP address is 1.1.1.1.
description.title: Description

enabled.description: Indicate whether to execute the rule.
enabled.title: Enabled

expression.description: Define the expression that determines which traffic matches the rule.
expression.title: Expression

id.description: Specify the unique ID of the rule.
id.title: ID

last_updated.description: Specify the timestamp of when the rule was last modified.
last_updated.title: Last Updated

GET /zones/{zone_id}/snippets.description: Fetches all snippets belonging to the zone.

schema.description: Use this field to specify the unique ID of the zone.
schema.title: Zone ID

schema.description: Specifies how many results to return per page.
schema.title: Per Page

allOf.description: Return all API responses using this object.

success.description: Indicate whether the API call was successful.
success.title: Success

allOf.title: Response

created_on.description: Indicates when the snippet was created.
created_on.title: Created On

modified_on.description: Indicates when the snippet was last modified.
modified_on.title: Modified On

result_info.description: Additional information to navigate the results.

count.description: Specify the number of results in the current page.
count.title: Count

per_page.description: Specifies how many results to return per page.
per_page.title: Per Page

total_count.description: Specify the total number of results.
total_count.title: Total Count

total_pages.description: Specify the total number of pages.
total_pages.title: Total Pages

result_info.title: Result Info
